summary: A Korean immigrant falls in love with her best friend while navigating her way through the challenges of living in a new country.
cast: Carolyn Eby|Taegu Andy Kang|Madgalena Karasinska|Bokja Kim|Gina Kim|Jiseon Kim|Jonathan Kobler|Hart Massey|Nathan Rodriguez|Virginia Wu
director: Director: So Yong Kim (as So-yong Kim)
title: In Between Days
